But theres a lot of pressure to use them as a way to make an income. In this episode, I explain why I dont plan to change.</p></div></div></div><div class="feed-pic"><a href="/10/"><img class="hidden" src=data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw== data-src="/assets/posts/Why-I-Dont-Use-Ads.jpg" /></a></div></div>

<div class="feed-item"><div class="feed-meta"><div class="meta-item">Oct 13, 2015</div><div class="meta-item">Joe Buhlig</div><div class="meta-item">16:32</div><div class="meta-item"><a class="meta-tag"  href="/tag/journaling">journaling</a><div class="meta-tag-arrow"></div></div><div class="meta-item"><a class="meta-tag"  href="/tag/life">life</a><div class="meta-tag-arrow"></div></div></div><div class="feed-content-wrapper"><div class="feed-icon"><a href="/9/"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 100 100" style="enable-background:new 0 0 100 100;" xml:space="preserve"><path fill="#f8d25b" d="M5.091,53.51C5.063,52.898,5,52.3,5,51.684C5,25.9,25.146,5,50,5s45,20.9,45,46.684  c0,0.616-0.068,1.215-0.088,1.826C93.977,28.583,74.26,8.656,50,8.656C25.739,8.656,6.022,28.583,5.091,53.51z M50,25.622  c15.164,0,27.527,12.291,28.425,27.788c0.034-0.6,0.088-1.191,0.088-1.796c0-16.338-12.764-29.579-28.513-29.579  S21.487,35.276,21.487,51.614c0,0.604,0.054,1.196,0.087,1.796C22.473,37.913,34.835,25.622,50,25.622z M50,34.274  c-5.158,0-9.343,4.342-9.343,9.692c0,5.35,4.186,9.691,9.343,9.691c5.156,0,9.342-4.342,9.342-9.691  C59.342,38.616,55.156,34.274,50,34.274z M50,54.467c-7.513,0-13.605,0.416-13.605,14.685C36.395,83.426,42.487,95,50,95  s13.605-11.574,13.605-25.849C63.605,54.883,57.513,54.467,50,54.467z"/></svg></a></div><div class="feed-content"><div class="feed-title"><a href="/9/"><h3>9: Really? Journaling? </h3></a></div><div class="feed-meta-mobile"><div class="meta-item">Oct 13, 2015</div><div class="meta-item">Joe Buhlig</div><div class="meta-item"><a class="meta-tag" href="/tag/journaling">journaling</a><div class="meta-tag-arrow"></div></div><div class="meta-item"><a class="meta-tag" href="/tag/life">life</a><div class="meta-tag-arrow"></div></div></div><div class="feed-excerpt"><p>I cant believe Ive started journaling every day. Ive always equated journaling with writing in a diary, which is not for me. But the effects of not journaling caught me off-guard.</p></div></div></div><div class="feed-pic"><a href="/9/"><img class="hidden" src=data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw== data-src="/assets/posts/Really-Journaling.png" /></a></div></div>
